snippet: The Celtics invited players from three of the franchise's championship teams to the Garden on Wednesday night to support them in their regular-season finale....
lead_paragraph: The Celtics invited players from three of the franchise's championship teams to the Garden on Wednesday night to support them in their regular-season finale.

headline.main: Celtics Roar Back From 26-Point Deficit to Beat Heat 98-88
headline.print_headline: Celtics Roar Back From 26-Point Deficit to Beat Heat 98-88
